definition: to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: The victim beefed and went to the police.
sentences.chinese: 受害人去向警方告發了。

sentences.english: He turned them in to the police for being involved in the riot.
sentences.chinese: 他向警方告發他們捲入了暴亂。

sentences.english: The young man snitched on the burglary to the police.
sentences.chinese: 這個年輕人向警察部門告發了一起夜盜案。

sentences.english: The sewer is treacherous and tells tales of you.
sentences.chinese: 陰溝是陰險的，可以告發你。

sentences.english: Because Wang Fa report, bass and the giant became a rat crossing the street.
sentences.chinese: 因爲王發的告發，劉利和擎天成了過街老鼠。

sentences.english: I don't want it to be said I grassed on my mates.
sentences.chinese: 我不希望別人說我告發了同夥。

sentences.english: She hesitated over whether she should report them to the authorities.
sentences.chinese: 她猶豫不定是否應向當局告發他們。

sentences.english: To organize and administer the distribution and operation of advertisements.
sentences.chinese: 組織管理廣告發布與廣告經營活動。

sentences.english: She split on her husband to the government.
sentences.chinese: 她向當局告發了她的丈夫。

sentences.english: That coward ratted on his fellow-workers.
sentences.chinese: 那個膽小鬼告發了和他一起幹活的工人。

sentences.english: To organize and administrate the activities of ad publishing and ad operation.
sentences.chinese: 組織管理廣告發布與廣告經營活動。

sentences.english: Mr. Lamo reported Private Manning’s disclosures to federal authorities, and Private Manning was arrested.
sentences.chinese: 拉莫先生向聯邦政府告發了曼寧，曼寧隨後遭到逮捕。

sentences.english: She felt like a fifth- grader who had snitched on a classmate.
sentences.chinese: 她覺得自己就像一個告發了同班同學的五年級學生。

sentences.english: Because zhuo or report information and hurt, so the police will venture and release.
sentences.chinese: 因爲卓或未有告發資雅傷人，故警方便將資雅釋放。

sentences.english: Tom is lucky he wasn't prosecuted for taking money under false pretences .
sentences.chinese: 湯姆很幸運，沒有人告發他騙取金錢。

sentences.english: I arrested him on whom someone had squealed.
sentences.chinese: 因有人告發，我抓到了他。

definition: to expose (e.g., wrongdoing)/to accuse (in court)/to impeach/to denounce
to bring to justice/to hand over to the law
to discipline sb/to punish/disciplinary action/to deal with (a matter)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to investigate and handle (a criminal case)
(of police etc) to stop (sb) for inspection/to pull (sb) over
lack of discipline/to break a rule/to violate discipline/to breach a principle
Kanting township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
